hero-section.secondary-heading: Be a Part of Positive Change, Start with Yourself
hero-section.paragraph: Every individual who contributes to this campaign becomes a part of a positive change that encompasses the entire society. Start with yourself and be the role model that others look up to. Let your positive energy radiate enthusiasm and motivation to those around you. Remember that collective efforts lead to remarkable results, and the challenges we face will seem fragile alongside our determination and commitment to make a change.

info-section.paragraph: Join with your friends in cleaning up a place in your area and use the hashtag #اليوم_الوطني_للتنظيف because the goal of the campaign is to clean up as many places in Iraq as possible and raise awareness about the importance of maintaining cleanliness.

upcoming-events-section.paragraph: Our message to all institutions, companies, departments, and the media... Join us and support the campaign so that together we can contribute to change on a day that brings all Iraqis together under the slogan

campaign-faces-section.header: Be a Face of the Campaign, Participate and Add Your Touch and Contribution to Your Country
paragraph: This campaign is a people's campaign, and it is our collective responsibility to uphold it and spread the spirit of change, cooperation, love, and this campaign.
but its message includes all the changes that we need to make by our own hands. Iraq needs many campaigns, whether they are about cleaning or other matters.
And this is just the beginning!

header: Join and Be Part of this Change
map-section.paragraph: Most of the waste we collect will contribute to recycling! These are: glass, plastic, aluminum. The first steps of recycling involve waste sorting.

faq-data.question: What is the cleaning campaign?
faq-data.answer: The cleaning campaign is a collective effort to clean public areas and the environment in Iraq, aiming to improve the appearance of cities and preserve their cleanliness.

faq-data.question: How can I participate in the cleaning campaign?
faq-data.answer: You can participate in the cleaning campaign by volunteering in dedicated events and following the announced instructions to participate effectively.

faq-data.question: What are the benefits of participating in the cleaning campaign?
faq-data.answer: Your participation in the cleaning campaign contributes to improving the environment and maintaining the cleanliness of cities, and it enhances environmental awareness within the community.

faq-data.question: Can I participate regardless of age?
faq-data.answer: Yes, everyone can participate in the cleaning campaign regardless of age, as raising awareness about cleanliness is important for everyone.

faq-data.question: What should I bring to participate in the campaign?
faq-data.answer: You may need to bring gloves and simple cleaning tools like garbage bags and a brush to facilitate the cleaning process.

newsletter-section.header: Subscribe to Receive Our Latest News
newsletter-section.paragraph: Stay updated on our campaigns, events, and announcements! Feel free to subscribe with your email.

paragraphs.title: How Did It Start?
paragraphs.description: The beginning was with our friend Murtadha Al-Tameemi when he decided to take a journey and clean the Tigris River. He wanted to enjoy the sunset on the riverbank. His idea was to involve people and spread the concept of cleanliness and cooperation. This is how the amazing #Safra_AlNazafa campaign started.
paragraphs.description2: Our campaign spread to the provinces of Baghdad and to all the provinces of Iraq, bringing together hundreds of young men and women from various ages, specialties, and aspirations.

paragraphs.title: Who Are the Cleanliness Ambassadors?
paragraphs.description: This campaign is for everyone and by everyone. We and you are the Cleanliness Ambassadors. If people support the cleanliness of our country and each one of us fulfills their duty, we become the ambassadors of cleanliness.
paragraphs.description2: Our duties are simple: not to litter on the streets, to show etiquette, and to kindly advise those who litter. We also participate in cleaning public areas.

paragraphs.title: Our Message and Next Steps
paragraphs.description: Our message is: With our hands, we can change and build. To reach trustworthiness and cleanliness, we must cooperate and continue. We, along with all participants in the campaign, will continue with love and hard work.
paragraphs.description2: Our next step is to expand and broaden the scope of the campaign. We will organize larger and more joyful events, making every day a celebration of cleanliness and the achievements of #Safra_AlNazafa.

our-team-section.header: Our Outstanding Team, the Source of Our Strength and the Foundation of Clean Ambassadors

join-team-section.header: Be a Part of This Team
join-team-section.paragraph: More than 50 campaigns across most provinces of Iraq, involving over 10,000 volunteers. We cleaned kilometers of rivers, collected over 75,000 bags of garbage. Join us and leave a significant mark by spreading the success of the Clean Ambassadors campaign with the dedicated volunteers who work day and night behind the scenes with sincerity and love for this country.

campaigns-page.header: With your efforts and participation, we will achieve the best for our country. Come join us in cleaning!

campaigns-data.name: Basrah Cleaning Campaign
campaigns-data.description: Join us for the Basrah Cleaning Campaign on Saturday in the Corniche area! Don't miss out on this opportunity to participate and contribute to the cleanliness of Basrah.

campaigns-data.name: Baghdad Cleaning Campaign
campaigns-data.description: There's a cleaning campaign in Baghdad on Sunday in the Liberation Square area! Don't miss out on this opportunity to participate and contribute to the cleanliness of Baghdad.

campaigns-data.name: Mosul Cleaning Campaign
campaigns-data.description: Join us on Monday in the streets of Mosul for a comprehensive cleaning campaign! Join now and participate in cleaning the forests in the Mosul area.

campaigns-data.name: Nasiriyah Cleaning Campaign
campaigns-data.description: Gather with us on Tuesday in Nasiriyah to start the city's cleaning campaign! Join us on Tuesday at Nasiriyah Park.

campaigns-data.name: Maysan Cleaning Campaign
campaigns-data.description: We invite you to join us on Wednesday for the Maysan cleaning campaign and make it even more beautiful! Join us on Wednesday at Najaf Ashraf Temple.

campaigns-data.name: Diwaniyah Cleaning Campaign
campaigns-data.description: Thursday marks the beginning of the Diwaniyah cleaning campaign! Join to make the city cleaner and more beautiful. Thursday marks the beginning of the Diwaniyah cleaning campaign!

governorate.label: Governorate
governorate.note: The governorate you will be cleaning this week (doesn't have to be your residence governorate)

form-section.important-note: Fill out this form to receive your unique barcode and use it in Clean Ambassadors gatherings.
form-section.note: Note: If you prefer not to share your information, you can still participate without filling out the form. However, you won't receive any campaign materials (such as t-shirts, water bottles, medals, etc.)

previous-events-section.secondary-header: Thank you to all participants in the cleanup campaign. Thanks to you, we have made a significant change and made these places clean and beautiful.

testimonials-data.name: Ninos Isho
testimonials-data.title: Volunteer
testimonials-data.review: The cleanup campaign is an important effort to preserve the beauty of the environment and human health. It contributes to preventing air and water pollution and reduces the impacts of climate change. Additionally, the campaigns organized by local communities enhance collective spirit and awareness of the importance of maintaining environmental cleanliness.

testimonials-data.name: Shahad
testimonials-data.title: Volunteer
testimonials-data.review: Thanks to the cleanup campaign's efforts, we have achieved tangible improvements in the quality of our surrounding environment. We have witnessed a noticeable reduction in air and water pollution, positively impacting our health and the health of our families. We have learned the importance of collective work and community participation in maintaining environmental cleanliness, and we now have a greater awareness of our impact on climate changes. We are proud to contribute to building a healthy and sustainable future for the next generations.

testimonials-data.name: Hammam
testimonials-data.title: Volunteer
testimonials-data.review: When I participated in the local cleanup campaign, I didn't realize the extent of our positive impact on our environment. I learned that cleaning streets and collecting waste is not just a task, but our duty to our planet and our health. Through our cooperation as a community, we were able to achieve a simple yet significant change in our local environment. We now have a sense of pride and responsibility towards the place we live in, and we are determined to continue working for a clean and healthy environment.

testimonials-data.name: Mohammed Taqi
testimonials-data.title: Volunteer
testimonials-data.review: My experience with the cleanup campaign was truly amazing. I didn't expect that joining the effort to clean the area would be so enjoyable and inspiring. I saw how ordinary individuals can make a significant positive impact on their environment. By collecting waste and cleaning public areas, the environment became more beautiful and healthier. My participation in this campaign has positively influenced my vision for the future, as I believe that small changes can lead to significant improvements in our lives and surroundings.

suggestions-form-section.header: Where do you want our next campaign to be?
